original_solution_mapping.L1: After his father gave him 13 biscuits, Randy has 32 + 13 = <<32+13=45>>45 biscuits.
original_solution_mapping.L2: After his mother gave him 15 biscuits, Randy has 45 + 15 = <<45+15=60>>60 biscuits.
original_solution_mapping.L3: After his brother ate 20 of the biscuits. Randy has 60 - 20 = <<60-20=40>>40 biscuits.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 4636.
    Returns: the number of biscuits Randy is left with.
    """
    # L1
    randy_initial_biscuits = 32 # Randy had 32 biscuits
    father_gift = 13 # His father gave him 13 biscuits
    biscuits_after_father = randy_initial_biscuits + father_gift

    # L2
    mother_gift = 15 # His mother gave him 15 biscuits
    biscuits_after_mother = biscuits_after_father + mother_gift

    # L3
    brother_ate = 20 # Randy’s brother ate 20 of these biscuits
    biscuits_remaining = biscuits_after_mother - brother_ate

    # FA
    answer = biscuits_remaining
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: After his father gave him {father_gift} biscuits, Randy has {randy_initial_biscuits} + {father_gift} = <<{randy_initial_biscuits}+{father_gift}={biscuits_after_father}>>{biscuits_after_father} biscuits.

After his mother gave him {mother_gift} biscuits, Randy has {biscuits_after_father} + {mother_gift} = <<{biscuits_after_father}+{mother_gift}={biscuits_after_mother}>>{biscuits_after_mother} biscuits.
After his brother ate {brother_ate} of the biscuits. Randy has {biscuits_after_mother} - {brother_ate} = <<{biscuits_after_mother}-{brother_ate}={biscuits_remaining}>>{biscuits_remaining} biscuits.

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: After his father gave him 13 biscuits, Randy has 32 + 13 = <<32+13=45>>45 biscuits.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: After his mother gave him 45 biscuits, Randy has 45 + 45 = <<45+45=90>>90 biscuits.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L3: After his brother ate 20 of the biscuits. Randy has 90 - 20 = <<90-20=70>>70 biscuits.

explanation: Input misrepresentation. The value for 'biscuits_after_father' (45) was used instead of 'mother_gift' (15).
